column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My wife and I had dinner here. We're happy to tell you that we had a great time and had a good time. Everything was fantastic! All of the staff members were courteous and knowledgeable
column2: which added to the overall enjoyment of the experience. The food was prepared flawlessly
column3: and the wine selection was excellent! We will undoubtedly return!
